name: imageInfo
description: Returns a structure that contains information about the image, such as height, width, color model, size, and filename.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

examples.title: Get Image Info
examples.description: Uses the imageRead function to read an image from a url.
examples.code:
<cfset img = imageRead("http://lorempixel.com/10/20/")>
<cfset imgInfo = imageInfo(img)>
<cfoutput>Image is #imgInfo.height#px high and #imgInfo.width#px wide.</cfoutput>

examples.title: Using info member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Extract the image info
